schema.title: Spotify Authorization
schema.description: In order to use spotify-adapter you first need to create a new Spotify Client ID at https://developer.spotify.com/dashboard/applications by clicking "Create a Client ID". Fill in the requested information (tick "I don't know what I'm building"). Next, copy the Client ID and Client Secret into the respective fields below and save.

clientSecret.title: The Client secret generated by Spotify

redirectURI.title: Redirect URL
redirectURI.description: This URL must match the one configured in your Spotify Application

authorized.title: Authorization status
authorized.description: Will be enabled once Spotify authorization completes

interval.title: Number of seconds for polling the current playback state
